definition: to snub/to consign to the trash heap of history
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: The mini-skirt caught on quickly but disappeared equally fast.
sentences.chinese: 迷你裙迅即流行，但是很快就被打入冷宮。

definition: to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
graceful words, flowery speech (idiom); elegant but insincere words/cheating wheedling/dishonest rhetoric
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
